info.title: Cisco IOS
info.description: A family of software used on most Cisco Systems routers and current Cisco network switches.

get.description: The show ip interface brief command can be used to view a summary of the router interfaces. This command displays the IP address, interface status, and additional information.

parameters.name: brief
parameters.description: Displays a summary of the usability status information for each interface.

ip_address.description: IP address assigned to the interface.

valid.description: Yes signifies that the IP address is currently valid. No signifies that the IP address is not currently valid.

protocol.description: Indicates the operational status of the routing protocol on this interface.
